main.name: Henok Ergana Selato
main.description: With a demonstrated history of working in the software development industry. Skilled in Java, Javascript, Node.js and HTML5. Strong engineering profession with a Master’s Degree in Computer Engineering focusing on Enterprise Systems from Università di Pisa
main.bio: I’m a Software Developer based in Biella, Italy. I got my Bsc degree in 2009 from Admas University College by Information and Communication Technology (ICT). After that I worked at Lt Software engineering as a programmer and went to Information and Network Security Agency (INSA) and worked for three years and ten months as a software developer. Subsequently I start to work as an independent application developer and worked some apps and freelance works. Then I enrolled for the Master of Science in Computer Engineering at the university of Pisa and got my Msc degree from there. Currently I’m working as a software Developer at Amaris Consulting at their Torino Office Italy.

work.title: Consulting Software Engineer
work.description: Working on Identity and Access Management System for Banca Sella. Using OpenAM which is access management, entitlements and federation server platform which is written in Java. On a daily basis i used OpenAM, Java, Shell Script, Tomcat Webserver, Oracle Database and SoapUI to develop, maintain and test the Identity and Access Management Platform of the organization.

work.title: Freelance Application Developer
work.description: I have been developing Software projects which both web and mobile applications for different client using tech stacks like Angular.js, node.js and mysql.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Requirement gathering and engineering, System analysis and design, User Interface design, Server side development, Database development,Deploying and unit testing, Preparing appropriate documentation, Prepare timely reports for the concerning body. At INSA the main tech stack used for developing the projects are Java Server Faces (JSF), Java persistence API (JPA) and Oracle Database managment system.

work.title: Programmer
work.description: My Main Task were System analysis and design, User Interface design, Server side development, Database development, Preparing appropriate documentation using Tech stacks like php, javascript and Mysql for database management system.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
